headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RIEWERTS, ELIZABETH R

snippet: RIEWERTS--Elizabeth R. The Officers and members of the Board of Trustees of the Jewish Home Family, note with profound sorrow the passing of Elizabeth Reed Riewerts - mother of Jewish Home at Rockleigh and Jewish Home Assisted Living past president and current Jewish Home Family, Assisted Living and Foundation trustee, Maggie Kaplen. Elizabeth was a very special person to all who were privileged to know her. She will be greatly missed by family and friends. We extend our deepest sympathy to her family - Maggie, Henry and Diane, Elizabeth Hillegas, Barbara Kwiecinski and Henry, her nice grandchildren and 12 great-grandchildren. We know that her loving kindness and good deeds will be a lasting legacy. Eli Ungar, Chairman Carol Silver Elliott, President & CEO 1/3
